snippet.title: One True Path - PART1 - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Since the start of early access in September 2024, the game gathered great reviews, is now accessible on Quest2 and got more polished along the way, so we're excited to officially release PART1 and welcome new players in Jacks Stevenson's genre-bending game worlds!

We would like to thank all the players who provided valuable feedback and helped us make a better game during the early access phase, here and on our discord. Newcomers can now get PART1 for $1.99, starting today. For all the players who claimed the title during early access, you'll be still able to access it for free, of course. Anyways, it's the right time to jump in the game!

Now, at the heart of One True Path lies a mystery: who killed Jack Stevenson, the reclusive author of the bestselling Fiendish Fates© gamebook series? Jack Stevenson is dead, but his ghost is counting you! Will YOU be able to unfold the mystery ?

And it's not too late to join the Innerspace community, give us feedback about the game, what you think of the story and how you'd like it to evolve in further chapters: discord.gg/NV9VZeYAa9

---

Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3217200/One_True_Path/
Quest : https://www.meta.com/experiences/one-true-path/7658526007582932/

---

To stay up to date about One True Path, join the community:
Our Discord: http://discord.gg/NV9VZeYAa9
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@innerspacevr
X: https://x.com/innerspacevr
https://www.innerspacevr.com/one-true-path
